name: Bulbapedia beautifier
description: Bulbapedia recently changed their default skin. I didn't like the new one, so I created this to fix it.
additional_info:
• Cleans ads & other cruft from pages
  • Makes the menu always visible and fixes it to the left side of the page
  • Moves the content area to the right instead of the middle
  • Makes the menu and the top navigation bar look pretty & fit more with the color scheme if the site
  • Applies to Bulbapedia, Bulbanews & Bulbagarden Archives
This has only been tested on my PC, if it has issues on yours please report so I can try to fix it. If you have any issues please try to provide information so I have a better idea what to change.
